div.h5: The Public Communications Authority is concerned with communications and information technology affairs and represents the highest authority
div.p: The Public Communications Authority is concerned with communications and information technology affairs and represents the highest authority responsible for the telecommunications sector in Libya. Its headquarters is located in the city of Tripoli (the company's headquarters General Post and Telecommunications). It was able to achieve many achievements by linking the various regions of Libya after the communications infrastructure was cut and vandalized during the months of the revolution. In addition to restoring communications, post and internet services, and completing some important strategic projects in an effort to contribute to the reunification and reconstruction of Libya, this body is chaired by the president. Commissioned by the President of the General Communications Authority, it deals with communications and information technology affairs and represents the highest authority responsible for the telecommunications sector in Libya. It is headquartered in the city of Tripoli (the headquarters of the General Post and Telecommunications Company) was able to achieve many achievements by linking the various regions of Libya after the communication infrastructure was severed. And sabotage during the months of the revolution, in addition to restoring communications, post and internet services, and completing some important strategic projects in an effort to contribute to the reunification and reconstruction of Libya. This body is chaired by a president assigned by a president
